headline: Rockwell Automation to Present at the Morgan Stanley 13th Annual Laguna Conference
summary: MILWAUKEE, August 28, 2025--Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK) Chairman & CEO, Blake Moret, and SVP & Chief Supply Chain Officer, Bob Buttermore, will present at the Morgan Stanley 13th Annual Laguna Conference on Thursday, Sept. 11, 2025, in Dana Point, Calif.
